TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExecutor implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An object that executes submitted tasks.

remarks.para: Memory consistency effects: Actions in a thread prior to submitting a Runnable object to an Executor its execution begins, perhaps in another thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Execute(class Java.Lang.IRunnable command) cil managed

Docs.summary: Executes the given command at some time in the future.

remarks.para: Executes the given command at some time in the future. The command may execute in a new thread, in a pooled thread, or in the calling thread, at the discretion of the Executor implementation.

Docs.exception: if this task cannot be accepted for execution
